guide.introduction: Sassy, sultry, yet utterly all-American, the San Francisco-based Devil-Ettes put on a kid-friendly, wickedly wild, high-energy show featuring historical dances from the heyday of 1960s go-go, including the Hully Gully, the Twist, the Frug, and the Watusi. They've also perfected the art of making devil horns.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sassy, sultry, yet utterly all-American, the San Francisco-based Devil-Ettes put on a kid-friendly, wickedly wild, high-energy show featuring historical dances from the heyday of 1960s go-go, including the Hully Gully, the Twist, the Frug, and the Watusi. They've also perfected the art of making devil horns.

Relevant parts
  • Craft clay
  • White glue
  • Glitter
  • Toothpick
  • Elastic cord
Tools
  • Bowls
  • Needle
  • Paintbrush

lines.text: Measure an equal amount of clay for each horn.
lines.text_raw: Measure an equal amount of clay for each horn.

lines.text: By hand, roll clay into 2 balls.
lines.text_raw: By hand, roll clay into 2 balls.

lines.text: Make the ends pointy and bend them in, forming horns.
lines.text_raw: Make the ends pointy and bend them in, forming horns.

lines.text: Stand horns upon the flat ends.
lines.text_raw: Stand horns upon the flat ends.

lines.text: Then insert a toothpick through each base, to allow for the elastic cord(this is what keeps them on your head!).
lines.text_raw: Then insert a toothpick through each base, to allow for the elastic cord(this is what keeps them on your head!).

lines.text: Allow horns to dry for 2-3 days.
lines.text_raw: Allow horns to dry for 2-3 days.

lines.text: After they're set (about 1 day), rotate the toothpicks daily.
lines.text_raw: After they're set (about 1 day), rotate the toothpicks daily.

lines.text: Holding the horn by the toothpick, paint the horn with glue, then dip it into glitter.
lines.text_raw: Holding the horn by the toothpick, paint the horn with glue, then dip it into glitter.

lines.text: Let dry, and then add another coat of glue and glitter to make sure the horn is extra sparkly.
lines.text_raw: Let dry, and then add another coat of glue and glitter to make sure the horn is extra sparkly.

lines.text: Once drying is complete, remove toothpicks.
lines.text_raw: Once drying is complete, remove toothpicks.

lines.text: Thread a darning needle with enough elastic to go around your head.
lines.text_raw: Thread a darning needle with enough elastic to go around your head.

lines.text: Pull the elastic through, and tie off the ends.
lines.text_raw: Pull the elastic through, and tie off the ends.

lines.text: Wear your horns and go-go with The Devil-Ettes!
lines.text_raw: Wear your horns and go-go with The Devil-Ettes!
